name: Windows 98 Platformer
description:
This platformer is a platformer, action of is going in the desktop and various apps of Windows 98. Controls are very easy. There are like in other games, made on Clickteam Fusion. Arrows. Left/Right. And Ctrl for Jump. The max score is 5.

And, there's 2 locations. That's all.

Sooo, this project is being made in Clickteam Fusion, so it's very easy. Also if you ask me, i can give you the source code, so you can do your project using this source.
